segments.text: ....right?
segments.speaker: Ross

segments.text: Right?
segments.speaker: Ross

segments.text: I mean it's pretty unbelievable y'know, I mean they just took off, took off without even looking back.
segments.speaker: Ross

segments.text: Y'know I don't, I don't need them, huh, I've got you guys now as friends, you and Susan.
segments.speaker: Ross

segments.text: Ah, Susan will be so pleased.
segments.speaker: Carol

segments.text: 717?  Where's 717?  Hey, you've have more of these for Susan right?
segments.speaker: Ross

segments.text: No. But it's okay, I'll just put out pickles or something.
segments.speaker: Carol

segments.text: Ross, thank God.
segments.speaker: Phoebe

segments.text: Pheebs? What, why are you whispering?
segments.speaker: Ross

segments.text: I ate a bug.
segments.speaker: Phoebe

segments.text: Hey Rach, the tampons here are only a penny. Let's stock up.
segments.speaker: Monica

segments.text: Listen Ross, we ran out of gas, and we don't know where we are, so we can't get a tow truck.
segments.speaker: Phoebe

segments.text: Oh, now you want a favour?
segments.speaker: Ross

segments.text: Yes, please.
segments.speaker: Phoebe

segments.text: Well, oh, I'm sorry your car broke down Pheebs, but I'm a little too busy with some of my real friends right now, but please call to let me know you got home safely okay?
segments.speaker: Ross

segments.text: Phoebe, hang on a second.  Here, take my car, go pick up your friends.
segments.speaker: Carol

segments.text: No, I'm not gonna pick them up.
segments.speaker: Ross

segments.text: Listen, we both know you're gonna do it 'cause you're not a jerk.
segments.speaker: Carol

segments.text: So you can either sulk here for a half hour and then go pick them up, or save us both time and sulk in the car.
segments.speaker: Carol

segments.text: No, Rachel doesn't want me to....
segments.speaker: Ross

segments.text: Look, I-I-I am sorry that Rachel dumped you 'cause she fell in love with that Mark guy, and you are the innocent victim in all of this, but don't punish your friends for what Rachel did to you.
segments.speaker: Carol

segments.text: Yeah, you're right.
segments.speaker: Ross
